page.title: 18Houses
page.content: Childs Ercall has a variety of houses. A small council Estate which has 24, three bedroomed house, some of which are now privately owned, and 14 one and two bedroomed old peoples bungalows. Apart from 4 farm cottages all other properties are privately owned. In Ollerton all houses are privately owned. Our D block has several small areas of houses most of which are privately owned. Most of the houses in the village are semi detached. The hall which is privately owned has four flats. Most of the houses have a garages. All of the familys in the village have at least one car but some have two. The council houses were built after the second world war when the war time huts wre cleared away. Most other houses are about 100 years old, except for the few that have been built recently.
